title: What is React?
content:
React is a Javascript front-end library. It is used to show content to users and handle user events.
Engineers use React to create reusable components.

title: How do we show content with React?
content:
Content in React is displayed and controlled through the use of components.
Components provide a way to create distinct portions of an application, each of which manages its own view, state, and behaviors.

title: Why is React useful for engineers?
content:
React is a powerful tool for managing all aspects of a front-end web application.
Engineers can define the state and behavior of components and let React handle the low-level DOM manipulations, while keeping the entire application synchronized.
